items.title: Brief About Angels
items.summary: An introduction to the nature and purpose of God's celestial messengers.

items.title: 1. Seraphim
items.summary: The highest order of angels, known for their burning love and proximity to God's throne.

items.title: 2. Cherubim
items.summary: Angels of deep wisdom and protectors of sacred spaces.

items.title: 3. Thrones
items.summary: Angels representing divine justice and the steadfastness of God's power.

items.title: 4. Dominions or Lordships
items.summary: Angels who regulate the duties of lower angels and manifest the majesty of God.

items.title: 5. Virtues or Strongholds
items.summary: Angels associated with miracles and the infusion of grace and courage into humanity.

items.title: 6. Powers
items.summary: The warrior angels who defend against evil spirits and maintain cosmic order.

items.title: 7. Principalities or Rulers
items.summary: Angels who watch over nations, cities, and the earthly leaders within the Church.

items.title: 8. Archangels
items.summary: The chief messengers of God who carry out missions of great importance for mankind.

items.title: 9. Angels
items.summary: The order closest to humans, acting as direct messengers and helpers in our daily lives.

items.title: Guardian Angels
items.summary: Personal celestial protectors assigned by God to every human soul.
